main event: On February 5, 1954, radar and visual observations recorded an unidentified flying object at Carswell AFB, Texas.
interesting points: The object was larger than a B-36 and had a long fuselage, dark grey color with no visible means of propulsion,The object emitted no sound during its flight,It was initially detected by radar at a distance of 13-15 miles and remained on a straight course before disappearing from sight,Multiple reliable observers including radar operators and tower personnel witnessed the object, The object was reported as having an elliptical wing structure and was tracked for several minutes.
witness description: Radar operators and tower personnel at Carswell AFB
